message: It kind of feels like the "Last Message: X minutes ago" doesn't give the context needed to determine whether a message should be clicked on or not. Message creator is great information, but having that "Last Message: {time} ago" makes me want to see who sent that last message.
I don't think we considered this before
It could either be "by {username}" or if there's space and it doesn't feel cluttered, it could use an inline icon of the user plus their username. Either way, it would make scanning a group faster.
corollary: I'd like to click on it to goto the message.
